"How to use the app.

" "Method 1: Click on any card to toggle the current value.

" "Method 2: Click on the action button on bottom left or mic icon the the action bar " " and then speak to turn on or off the light. For example to turn on red light, you have to" " say turn on the red light please and the red light will turn on. Similarly to turn off the" " the light, you have to say, " turn off the red light please ". And there you go the light" " will turn on/off according to you speech."
